function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing unverified information on COVID-19","Impact":"Increased spread of misinformation and potential panic among the public","Mitigation":"Promote fact-checking and source verification before sharing information","Technologies":"Social media fact-checking tools, AI-based misinformation detection systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"COVID-19 related cyberchondria","Impact":"Increased anxiety and hypochondriac behavior related to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote balanced and reliable information about COVID-19, provide mental health support","Technologies":"Telemedicine for mental health, online counseling platforms","People":"Individuals experiencing anxiety related to COVID-19","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Gender differences in cyberchondria and information sharing","Impact":"Potential bias and misrepresentation of COVID-19 related behaviors and beliefs","Mitigation":"Ensure gender-inclusive communication and support, address gender-specific concerns in public health messaging","Technologies":"Inclusive data collection and analysis tools, gender-specific health communication strategies","People":"Public health agencies, researchers, media","Owner":"Public health agencies, media organizations"}]}
